creditline: Gift of David A. Wilson and Michael J. Peterman
description: surreal, dystopian scene: stripped pole-like greenish trees in background with mounds of detritus at L and R; rocks, odds, and ends, and blue chair on a short column at L; orange and white stripped barricade bottom C; carved out building in wood and corrugated metal at R, with metal stacks, barrels, bricks, ladders at R; white sheet with "NOW" painted near C; burning tree stump nearby; moon-like rock near post with "OTMP" LRC
signed: signed and dated on back, lower edge of support, in marker: \"Camp site 2017 (Nipples & Fur)\" B. Tapola | old signature and title in grease pencil on back near C: \"Nipples & Fur\" / Tapola \'03
title: Base Camp (Nipples and Fur)
